snippet: A family found that living on the top floor of a high rise in Queens did not shield them from hardships imposed by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Hurricane Sandy's impact was not just on those living at or near ground level; even residents of high-rises, like apartment complexes in the Rockaways, struggle to recover from prolonged loss of services and fearful nights spent in the dark and cold (Series: Coming Back).
lead_paragraph: A family found that living on the top floor of a high rise in Queens did not shield them from hardships imposed by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: High Above the Floods, Still Feeling Hurricane Sandy’s Sting
headline.main: Far Above the Flooding, Yet Still Feeling a Hurricane’s Sting
headline.print_headline: Far Above the Flooding, Yet Still Feeling a Hurricane’s Sting
